attributes.action: Remove the value of enviromentally friendly housing upgrades from the value for a home when working out stamp duty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently adding solar panels, wind turbines etc to your property adds to the value of the house meaning that it can push the value into the next stamp duty bracket making it non cost effective for some one to purchase. To encourage people to upgrade to these only charge stamp duty on property with out the added value of the environmentally friendly additions.
